Check if population equation components add up within one year

Source: R/check_balance.R
check_balance.Rd

Function to check if the components in the propop::propop() output add up. Takes the population at the beginning of the year (n_jan), adds all components (births - mor - emi_int - emi_nat + imm_int + imm_nat + acq) and checks if the sum is equal to the population at the end of the year (n_dec).

Usage

check_balance(data)

Arguments

data

data frame containing population projections; can be created with propop::propop().

Value

data frame containing summary statistics.

Examples

propop(
  parameters = fso_parameters,
  year_first = 2024,
  year_last = 2027,
  population = fso_population,
  subregional = FALSE,
  binational = TRUE
) |>
  check_balance()
#>

#> ℹ Process...
#> ✔ Processing completed in [1.3s]
